## IdentityManager.identityManagerRemoveKey() method

Removes a key from a DID Document

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
identityManagerRemoveKey({ did, kid, options }: IIdentityManagerRemoveKeyArgs, context: IAgentContext<IKeyManager>): Promise<any>;
```
